entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind west 20 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 32 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 29 except minus 34 inland.
